name: Magic dice survival
description:
Try to survive in the arena full of enemies.

Roll your magic dice to choose desired spell and throw it to cast selected ability which would be best to quickly slain monsters.

There are 6 spells to choose from.

The longer you roll the farther your dice will go. 

Carefully choose skills to use because some of them can cause problems to you.

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
